root.name: Trainz Simulator 12
root.description: FeaturesLike most games in the series, you can either design and build routes, or play through existing ones that come with the game, with additional addon content available for download. The new features of this edition are the following:MultiplayerSatellite view of routesNew SpeedTree assets for route buildersCompatible with TS 2010 contentCollector's EditionA collector's edition was announced by Auran on their forums on March 18th 2011. Only 2500 copies will be produced. This edition consists of the following:10th Anniversary Collector's Edition Metal Case, signed by the entire teamThe Trainz Simulator 12 gameAn individually numbered certificateKeyboard shortcuts chart for both Driver and Surveyor modesPoster30-day First Class Ticket for priority access and download speed for the Download Station, with a 20% discount on a longer First Class Ticket order245 page extended collector's manualIn addition, 10 of the 2500 copies will contain a Golden Ticket which gives the following:A lifetime First Class Ticket for the Download StationFree Trainz retail products for 5 years (May 1, 2011 to May 1, 2016)An opportunity to be created into a virtual driver in the gameSystem RequirementsOperating system: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / Windows 7Processor: Pentium D 3.4GHz (or equiv)Memory: 1 GB RAMHard disk space: 16 GB of hard drive spaceVideo: nVidia GeForce 7200/128MB or equivalentSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cardDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0c
